website_summaries.verdict: Socks allow free movement of the foot versus braces. They provide help for more than just plantar fasciitis.
pros: Applies light and comfortable pressure on the foot, which reduces swelling
Tight fit means the socks don't slip out of place
Socks work well for wearing all day and night
cons: A few users said the socks fit far too tight and hurt after a while
Socks may not last a long time with fraying

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommends!
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet 9 hours a day and started having problems with my heels. Been having severe pain in my heels for a while, it was even waking me up at night. After reading some reviews I decided to try these and sure glad I did! First night I received them I soaked my sore feet in an ice bath and slipped on these socks then went to sleep. for the first time in days I slept all night without waking up from pain. I recommend them. The quality of the product is also really good and look like it will last. Recommended. I will definitely be purchasing an extra pair!
customer_reviews.author: Gisele

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I measured between a small and a medium so I opted for the medium. I have plantar fasciaitis with pain only in my heel. When I wear them very long, the pressure around the front of my foot is very painful and I have to take them off. Have had no pain relief at all from wearing this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eland

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Plantar faciaitis for nearly a year. I have tried insoles, rolling frozen water bottles, excercizing with very little long term relief. This sleeve helped my foot feel better from day 1! I just returned from a trip to Disneyland and Furniture Market and my foot did not bother me at all. I wear it every day and take it off at night. It's so nice to be mostly free of the pain!
customer_reviews.author: louise rothman

customer_reviews.title: ... or puckers over the ankle making them not as comfortable as another brand I later bought
customer_reviews.text: These had little gathers or puckers over the ankle making them not as comfortable as another brand I later bought. If you have low arches, I would guess these would work for you, but if your arches are high, they will not fit correctly. The material is not elastic enough to allow for both types of arch, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Easy delivery

customer_reviews.title: Great support & comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I had already been using another brand of compression sleeves for several months & found that they really helped my plantar fasciitis pain. I wanted another pair, but didn't want to spend a lot of money. I tried these & I love them just as much as a more expensive brand. They give your foot the support it needs. I wear socks over them for work as a nurse. I wear them alone with sandals around the house & outside too if needed. These have allowed me to be on my feet when I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just wore these today for the first time. I work on my feet on cement floors all day. It is not uncommon for me to walk 30000 steps a day. I began to suffer from plantar fasciitis over a year ago and now have bone spurs. I purchased better inserts for my shoes which helped a bit. I still have pain at the end of each day. Today was the first day that I had no pain. I walked 27000 steps so far and my feet feel like it's morning and I'm still ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: They really help!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the new sleeves! They have helped. I am on my feet all day for work and I come home and walk every day for 1/2 hour. The foot pain isn't as severe. My only regret is that I lost one of them right away, and now I am down to just one! I am thinking about ordering another pair. I only need to use one at a time, but I need another one so I can wash it out at night.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't wear them for more than an hour at ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wear them for more than an hour at a time they actually caused my feet to hurt more
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Dont Work
customer_reviews.text: Dont work for plantar fasciitis, but comfy for a couple of hours after working out while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnygirl

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned believer!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased these. I am on my feet most of the day & my heels/arches felt like I was walking on marbles. The 1st day I wore the socks I couldn't believe how wonderful my feet felt - like I could walk for miles! About the 4th day, I didn't wear them & the pain returned. I have purchased more & am a believer!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: The product was well packed in a bubble envelop for safe arrival in Hawaii. Package arrived on time. So far, my pain level has dropped from an 8 to a 2 wearing the foot sleeves from as soon as I get up. I highly recommend this product if you are suffering from Tarsal Tunnel Syndrome. Aloha.
customer_reviews.author: Cristhian Labbe

customer_reviews.title: I figured out recently that my arches have fallen, and I have been desperately searching for pain relief. I can walk around bare
customer_reviews.text: I figured out recently that my arches have fallen, and I have been desperately searching for pain relief. I can walk around barefoot and not be in horrible pain. I was limping and tiptoeing to relieve the pain and pressure, but after about 3-4 days of wearing these socks, I get relief from them.
customer_reviews.author: carol mack

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Finally plantar fasciitis Socks that do the job. You can wear your socks over them. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really good for achy feet or standing/ walking all day. Good material. Nice and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Selleree

customer_reviews.title: I think it helps
customer_reviews.text: When I remember to wear it! I have a horrible heel spur in my left foot. When I wear this (especially when I'm doing a lot of walking or during a workout) it seems to help a bunch. The fit is great and I wear a size 7 shoe, but my foot is on the wide side. It didn't cut off my circulation - which some of these kind of socks do.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Silla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These helped my daughter's arch and heel pain. She wears them playing sports and when doing lots of walking.
customer_reviews.author: its ok

customer_reviews.title: Feels great when I first put them on
customer_reviews.text: They are really tight, which feels great when I first put them on, but I often take them off before morning. However I do feel like they have helped because I don't seem to limp as much each morning when I first get up.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Adams

customer_reviews.title: these really help my plantar faciitis
customer_reviews.text: And I especially like that the logo is on the inside and doesn't show!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are just what I needed. I sleep in them every night. If I don't, the next day I suffer. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AngelAnn

customer_reviews.title: Buttons and pleats.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, they cost a little more,but well worth it. They are comfortable and fit well with good support. I wear size 8.5 shoe and medium socks.
customer_reviews.author: P at Sch

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on a Sunday morning(!) and are exactly as described. Time will tell if they're the solution I've been seeking to my foot issues but they do meet exactly the description on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fakier

customer_reviews.title: my foot feels much better.
customer_reviews.text: Between using the foot sleeve and a night splint, my foot feels much better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Really love this, used them after a long day of ...
customer_reviews.text: Really love this, used them after a long day of walking at universal studios my feet were killing me. Wore them to sleep next day my feet were back to normal:) buying another pay for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Grisell

customer_reviews.title: great support!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears them when her arthritis/planter fachitis(sic) flairs up and it helps her to stay mobile. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Reid Jr.

customer_reviews.title: ... they are supposed to do which is to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to do which is to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pagel

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Have helped, I wear them all day and will be wearing another pair for bedtime as when I wore them to bed it helped my fit in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Sitton

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: This socks works. Is definitely a good buy for me. Thanks seller and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Chumioque

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever. It helps my heel pain and helps me to sleep alot better now when I go to bed or walk.
customer_reviews.author: MISTI LITTLE

customer_reviews.title: foot sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size larger than my size. It does not cut off the circulation in my foot. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Carmel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The socks are very well made and are comfortable for a 12 hour day.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rubidge

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. I found if you wear all day there may be a little leg swelling.
customer_reviews.author: SC Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Keeps everything tight
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boxing/kickboxing classes. Love them! Keeps everything tight.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN PASTERCHEK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and do a great job. I will purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: cody freeman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: Socks fit snugly. Easy to get on and off. Color is as shown
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect..
customer_reviews.text: This sock supports my foot in all the right places. Perfect...want to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea King

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: These really help support my arches well & make it comfortable to wear shoes without arch support inserts, BUT my feet start to hurt when I wear them too long.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the compression wrapping the arch of the foot can be tighter. However the sock compression is made of good quality material. There were no loose fibers and the seams were consistent. It fits well and can be worn easily wit sneakers or shoes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fung

customer_reviews.title: They feel good on the feet!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these socks but I just don’t know if they are enough to help with plantar fasciitis. Still they do feel good on the feet so I will keep wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: smallaptnyc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These do nothing besides compress your foot bones together and cause pain in your joints.
customer_reviews.author: Linde M. Aseltine

customer_reviews.title: I do like to put them on when I get home from ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't wear them all day cause they get uncomfortable after about 4 hrs. I do like to put them on when I get home from work and get off my feet.
customer_reviews.author: hortencia

customer_reviews.title: Sox are so smooth on the feet and easy to pull on
customer_reviews.text: Sox are so smooth on the feet and easy to pull on. Don't feel one seam or knots in thread. Very please and will order again...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont run in these!
customer_reviews.text: Great for daytime support and sympathy when struggling with PF, but dont run in these. Swelling and pain. Good news is you can pull them off and put in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: MRed

customer_reviews.title: These Work
customer_reviews.text: These have helped my daughter with plantar fasciitis! Comfy and nice quality sock.
customer_reviews.author: J. Benzaquen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Socks are comfortable and give excellent support to aleve pain for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: maverick sciarrino

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I find these are too tight over the top of my very skinny foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: sad: -( so i can't recommend them based on ...
customer_reviews.text: well-i was very excited to get them based on the reviews BUTTTTT, there was already a whole in one of the inside heels and the other had a whole beginning .... sad :-( so i can't recommend them based on what i received...
customer_reviews.author: Mimi wazinski
